description.p: Activation: Creatures within a 5-foot radius circle centered on a point you can see within 60 feet of the cannon must make a Dexterity saving throw. They take 2d8 acid damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Unaccompanied objects in the area take damage as well.

description.p: Activation: The cannon charges up and unleashes a lighting bolt. Creatures in a line 30 feet long and 5 wide emanating from the cannon must make a Dexterity saving throw. they take 2d8 lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren’t being worn or carried.

description.p: Activation: The cannon emits a tremendous roar. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the cannon must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 5 feet away from the cannon. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn’t pushed. In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 5 feet away from the cannon and the cannon emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.

description.p: Activation: Make a ranged spell attack, originating from the cannon, at one creature or object within 120 feet of it. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 necrotic damage, and if it is reduced to 0 hit points before the end of your next turn, it dies. If it is a Small or Medium humanoid, it rises as a zombie under your control as per the Animate Dead spell as long as the Doom Cannon exists.

description.p: This spell creates either a Flamethrower, Force Ballista, Protector, Tractor Beam Cannon, or Frost Cannon. Whenever you activate it, you may also transform it into one of the cannons listed. The transformation happens before the effect.

At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you may also create an Acidic Cannon or Shocking Cannon. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level, you may create a Booming Cannon, Doom Cannon, or Throne Cannon.

description.p: This spell creates either a Flamethrower, Force Ballista, Protector, Tractor Beam Cannon, or Frost Cannon. The cannon has legs and is size Large. It has a space where a Small or Medium size creature can sit. When the cannon moves, it and any creature sitting on it do not provoke opportunity attacks.
Choose whether the cannon is light or heavy. A light cannon can move up to 30 feet instead of 15. A heavy cannon has an AC of 19 and a number of hit points equal to six times your artificer level.

At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you may also create a Shocking Cannon or an Acidic Cannon. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level, you may create a Booming Cannon or Doom Cannon.

If they fail, they become poisoned until the start of your next turn and take 2d8 poison damage. Creatures that suceed take half damage and are not poisoned.

description.p: This spell gives you a latent but potent potential. Once while this spell lasts, you can activate it when you use your Eldritch Cannon feature, giving you the following benefit for 1 minute.

ul.li: You can now have three cannons at the same time. You can create three with the same action (but not the same spell slot), and you can activate all of them with the same bonus action. You determine whether the cannons are identical to each other or different. If you have three cannons still existing after 1 minute, one of them (your choice) is destroyed.
